name: Stone-Fruit Chutney
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds chopped stone fruit (peaches, nectarines, plums, cherries or apricots, for example)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine fruit, brown sugar and water in a skillet and bring to a boil.

Reduce heat and simmer until just tender, about 15 minutes, stirring
occasionally.
Add orange juice and ginger, curry powder and a pinch of ground cloves. Simmer, reducing mixture to desired thickness.
Partly cool, then stir in raisins and toasted nuts (like macadamia), and serve.
